short_summary: request for General goods / tender has expired
description: Tender for the supply, delivery and installation of 9 72” x 84” L-sit stand, 30” deep, minimum 26-48” range. Each sit stand to have a minimum four (4) outlet power bar securely attached to underside of the unit to accommodate the power module & monitors.
full_summary:
**Tender Announcement: EP922-240099 B - Large Sit Stands for ECCC**

# Tender Details
- **Tender Reference Number** : WS4027617797-Doc4169608871
- **Amendment Number** : 9
- **Notice of Amendment Date** : October 26, 2023
- **Publication Date** : August 29, 2023
- **Tender Closing Date** : October 31, 2023, 2:00 PM EDT
- **Expected Contract Start Date** : August 24, 2023
- **Expected Contract End Date** : February 29, 2024

## Solicitation Requirements
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of Environment and Climate Change Canada (ECCC) is seeking bids for the supply, delivery, and installation of 9 large sit-stand units. The sit-stands must meet the following specifications:
- Each unit must be 72” x 84” x 30” deep
- Each unit must have a minimum four (4) outlet power bar securely attached to the underside of the unit to accommodate the power module and monitors
- The height adjustment range of each unit must be at least 26-48” high

## Evaluation Criteria
The evaluation will be based on the lowest price submitted by the bidders.

## Notice for Bidders
Please note that this solicitation cancels and supersedes previous solicitation number Doc4065598218 EP922-240099/A dated August 8, 2023. A debriefing session will be provided upon request to bidders who submitted a bid on the previous solicitation.

Additionally, please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by October 31, 2023, at 2:00 PM EDT. Any bid submitted after 2:00 PM EDT on the closing date will be declared non-responsive.
